00034 nothrow_integer::nothrow_integer() {
00035     _attach_0();
00036 }
00037 
00039 nothrow_integer::nothrow_integer(const nothrow_integer& b) {
00040     try {
00041         if (!b.is_nan()) _attach(b);
00042     } catch (std::exception&) {
00043         if (exceptions_allowed()) throw;
00044     }
00045 }
00046 
00057 nothrow_integer::nothrow_integer(const integer& b) {
00058     try {
00059         _attach(b);
00060     } catch (std::exception&) {
00061         if (exceptions_allowed()) throw;
00062     }
00063 }
00064 
00066 nothrow_integer::nothrow_integer(const std::string& str, size_t base) {
00067     try {
00068         _attach(from_string(str, base));
00069     } catch (std::exception&) {
00070         if (exceptions_allowed()) throw;
00071     }
00072 }

00078 bool nothrow_integer::odd() const {
00079     if (is_nan()) {
00080         if (exceptions_allowed()) throw exception::not_a_number();
00081         else return false;
00082     }
00083     return ((_get_digit(0) & 0x01)==1);
00084 }
00085 
00090 bool nothrow_integer::even() const {
00091     if (is_nan()) {
00092         if (exceptions_allowed()) throw exception::not_a_number();
00093         else return false;
00094     }
00095     return ((_get_digit(0) & 0x01)==0);
00096 }
00097 
00102 int nothrow_integer::sign(bool signed_zero) const {
00103     if (is_nan()) {
00104         if (exceptions_allowed()) throw exception::not_a_number();
00105         else return 0;
00106     }
00107     if (!signed_zero && _is_zero()) return 0;
00108     else return (_get_negative() ? -1 : 1);
00109 }

00115 size_t nothrow_integer::hex_digits() const {
00116     try {
00117         return xint::nothrow_integer(*this).hex_digits();
00118     } catch (std::exception&) {
00119         if (exceptions_allowed()) throw;
00120         else return 0;
00121     }
00122 }

00130 bool nothrow_integer::is_nan() const {
00131     return _is_nan();
00132 }

00134 nothrow_integer& nothrow_integer::operator+=(const nothrow_integer& addend) {
00135     try {
00136         *this=nothrow_integer(xint::nothrow_integer(*this).operator+=(xint::nothrow_integer(addend)));
00137     } catch (std::exception&) {
00138         if (exceptions_allowed()) throw;
00139         *this=nothrow_integer::nan();
00140     }
00141     return *this;
00142 }
00143 
00144 nothrow_integer& nothrow_integer::operator-=(const nothrow_integer& subtrahend) {
00145     try {
00146         *this=nothrow_integer(xint::nothrow_integer(*this).operator-=(xint::nothrow_integer(subtrahend)));
00147     } catch (std::exception&) {
00148         if (exceptions_allowed()) throw;
00149         *this=nothrow_integer::nan();
00150     }
00151     return *this;
00152 }

00154 nothrow_integer& nothrow_integer::operator=(const nothrow_integer &c) {
00155     try {
00156         _attach(c);
00157     } catch (std::exception&) {
00158         if (exceptions_allowed()) throw;
00159         _attach(0);
00160     }
00161     return *this;
00162 }

00164 nothrow_integer& nothrow_integer::operator*=(const nothrow_integer& b) { *this=multiply(*this, b); return *this; }
00165 nothrow_integer& nothrow_integer::operator/=(const nothrow_integer& b) { *this=divide(*this, b); return *this; }
00166 nothrow_integer& nothrow_integer::operator%=(const nothrow_integer& b) { *this=mod(*this, b); return *this; }

00168 nothrow_integer& nothrow_integer::operator++() { *this += one(); return *this; }
00169 nothrow_integer& nothrow_integer::operator--() { *this -= one(); return *this; }
00170 nothrow_integer  nothrow_integer::operator++(int) { nothrow_integer s=*this; *this += one(); return s; }
00171 nothrow_integer  nothrow_integer::operator--(int) { nothrow_integer s=*this; *this -= one(); return s; }

00173 nothrow_integer  nothrow_integer::operator<<(size_t shift) const { return shift_left(*this, shift); }
00174 nothrow_integer  nothrow_integer::operator>>(size_t shift) const { return shift_right(*this, shift); }
00175 nothrow_integer& nothrow_integer::operator&=(const nothrow_integer& n) { *this=bitwise_and(*this, n); return *this; }
00176 nothrow_integer& nothrow_integer::operator|=(const nothrow_integer& n) { *this=bitwise_or(*this, n); return *this; }
00177 nothrow_integer& nothrow_integer::operator^=(const nothrow_integer& n) { *this=bitwise_xor(*this, n); return *this; }

00179 nothrow_integer& nothrow_integer::operator<<=(size_t shift) {
00180     try {
00181         *this=nothrow_integer(xint::nothrow_integer(*this).operator<<=(shift));
00182     } catch (std::exception&) {
00183         if (exceptions_allowed()) throw;
00184         *this=nothrow_integer::nan();
00185     }
00186     return *this;
00187 }

00189 nothrow_integer& nothrow_integer::operator>>=(size_t shift) {
00190     try {
00191         *this=nothrow_integer(xint::nothrow_integer(*this).operator>>=(shift));
00192     } catch (std::exception&) {
00193         if (exceptions_allowed()) throw;
00194         *this=nothrow_integer::nan();
00195     }
00196     return *this;

00199 const nothrow_integer& nothrow_integer::zero() {
00200     if (cZero.get()==0) cZero.reset(new nothrow_integer(xint::nothrow_integer::zero()));
00201     return *cZero;
00202 }
00203 
00204 const nothrow_integer& nothrow_integer::one() {
00205     if (cOne.get()==0) cOne.reset(new nothrow_integer(xint::nothrow_integer::one()));
00206     return *cOne;
00207 }
00208 
00209 const nothrow_integer& nothrow_integer::nan() {
00210     if (cNaN.get()==0) {
00211         nothrow_integer *n=new nothrow_integer();
00212         n->_attach(0);
00213         cNaN.reset(n);
00214     }
00215     return *cNaN;
00216 }
00217 
00218 void nothrow_integer::_make_unique() {
00219     try {
00220         _base_make_unique();
00221     } catch (std::exception&) {
00222         if (exceptions_allowed()) throw;
00223         _attach(0); // Turns it into a Not-a-Number.
00224     }
00225 }
